advancements.sanitydim.first_death.descr: Become a victim of your own insanity
advancements.sanitydim.first_death.title: §0How did you take off your straitjacket?
advancements.sanitydim.for_god_sake.desc: Get rid of the Sneaking Terror
advancements.sanitydim.for_what_sake.des: Get rid of the Rotting Stalker
advancements.sanitydim.insane_1.title: §0Did I ever tell you what the definition of insanity is?
advancements.sanitydim.insane_2.title: §0Insanity is doing the exact... same fucking thing... over and over again expecting... shit to change...
gui.sanitydim.hint.insane.7: TOO LOUD TOO LOUD TOO LOUD
gui.sanitydim.hint.insomnia.8: One sheep, two sheep, three sheep...
item.sanitydim.garland.tooltip:
§7Something to help soothe the nerves

Slowly restores your sanity and makes you slightly more resistant to stress
item.sanitydim.nightmare_fuel.tooltip:
§8It feels oily to the touch...

§7Burns for a long time as furnace fuel-- maybe it has alchemical uses?
item.sanitydim.nightmare_flesh.tooltip:
§8The flesh is practically inedible, not like you'd want to eat it anyway...

§7Might make for a good leather if you could treat it.
item.sanitydim.nightmare_leather.tooltip:
§8Slick and tough, but seems to be vulnerable to daylight.

Maybe cooking it even more will make it normal?
